content: अरणिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} --णी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [ऋ-अनि <ls>Uṇ. 2. 101</ls>; अरणिः अग्नेर्योनिः] A piece of wood (of the Śamī tree) used for kindling the sacred fire by attrition, the fire-producing wooden stick; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Pt. 1. 216.</ls> --णी (dual) The two pieces of wood used in kindling the sacred fire. --णिः {@--1@} The sun. {@--2@} Fire. {@--3@} Flint. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of several fire-producing plants, particularly अग्निमंथ. --णिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A path, way. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Stinginess.
